trans-unit.source: ‘Authenticated’ Role is now added dynamically by the PluggableAuthService, not by any role manager
trans-unit.target: ‘Authenticated’ Role is now added dynamically by the PluggableAuthService, not by any role manager

trans-unit.source: (WebDav, XML-RPC, FTP) use the setuptools extra
trans-unit.target: (WebDav, XML-RPC, FTP) use the setuptools extra

trans-unit.source: Add a publicly callable “logout” method on the PluggableAuthService instance that will call resetCredentials on all activated ICredentialsRest plugins, thus effecting a logout.
trans-unit.target: Add a publicly callable “logout” method on the PluggableAuthService instance that will call resetCredentials on all activated ICredentialsRest plugins, thus effecting a logout.

trans-unit.source: Add a test for manage_zmi_logout and replace a call to isImplementedBy with providedBy. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/58)
trans-unit.target: Add a test for manage_zmi_logout and replace a call to isImplementedBy with providedBy. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/58)

trans-unit.source: Add missing interface for IPropertiedUser and tests (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/16)
trans-unit.target: Add missing interface for IPropertiedUser and tests (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/16)

trans-unit.source: Add new event to be able to notify group creation.
trans-unit.target: Добавьте новое событие,чтобы иметь возможность уведомить о создании группы.

trans-unit.source: Add new event to be able to notify group deletion.
trans-unit.target: Добавить новое событие,чтобы иметь возможность уведомить об удалении группы.

trans-unit.source: Add new events to be able to notify when a principal is added to or removed from a group. Notify these events when principals are added or removed to a group in ZODBGroupManager (#17)
trans-unit.target: Add new events to be able to notify when a principal is added to or removed from a group. Notify these events when principals are added or removed to a group in ZODBGroupManager (#17)

trans-unit.source: Add support for property plugins returning an IPropertySheet to PropertiedUser. Added addPropertysheet to the IPropertiedUser.
trans-unit.target: Добавьте поддержку плагинов свойств,возвращающих IPropertySheet в PropertiedUser.Добавлен лист свойств addPropertysheet в IPropertiedUser.

trans-unit.source: Added WARNING-level logs with tracebacks for all swallowed plugin exceptions, so that you notice that there is something wrong with the plugins.
trans-unit.target: Добавлены журналы уровня WARNING с трассировкой для всех проглоченных исключений плагинов,так что вы заметили,что что-то не так с плагинами.

trans-unit.source: Added a _getPAS method to the BasePlugin base class to be used as the canonical way of getting at the PAS instance from within plugins.
trans-unit.target: В базовый класс BasePlugin добавлен метод _getPAS,который будет использоваться в качестве канонического способа получения экземпляра PAS из плагинов.

trans-unit.source: Added a method to the IRoleAssignerPlugin to remove roles from a principal, and an implementation for it on the ZODBRoleManager. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/57)
trans-unit.target: Added a method to the IRoleAssignerPlugin to remove roles from a principal, and an implementation for it on the ZODBRoleManager. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/57)

trans-unit.source: Added an “empty” GenericSetup profile, which creates a PAS containing only a plugin registry and a setup tool.
trans-unit.target: Added an “empty” GenericSetup profile, which creates a PAS containing only a plugin registry and a setup tool.

trans-unit.source: Added events infrastructure. Enabled new IPrincipalCreatedEvent and ICredentialsUpdatedEvent events.
trans-unit.target: Инфраструктура добавленных событий.Включены новые события IPrincipalCreatedEvent и ICredentialsUpdatedEvent.

trans-unit.source: Added export / import support for the ChallengeProtocolChooser plugin’s label - protocols mapping.
trans-unit.target: Added export / import support for the ChallengeProtocolChooser plugin’s label - protocols mapping.

trans-unit.source: Added support for registering plugin types via ZCML.
trans-unit.target: Добавлена поддержка регистрации типов плагинов через ZCML.

trans-unit.source: Added suppport for exporting / importing a PAS and its content via the GenericSetup file export framework.
trans-unit.target: Добавлена поддержка экспорта/импорта PAS и его содержимого через фреймворк экспорта файлов GenericSetup.

trans-unit.source: Added test for multiple auth header support in the HTTPBasicAuthHelper.
trans-unit.target: Добавлен тест на поддержку нескольких автозаголовков в HTTPBasicAuthHelper.

trans-unit.source: Added three methods to PAS and IPluggableAuthService:
trans-unit.target: Добавлены три метода в PAS и IPluggableAuthService:

trans-unit.source: Added two new interfaces, IChallengeProtocolChooser and IRequestTypeSniffer. Those are used to select the ‘authorization protocol’ or ‘challenger protocol’ to be used for challenging according to the incoming request type.
trans-unit.target: Added two new interfaces, IChallengeProtocolChooser and IRequestTypeSniffer. Those are used to select the ‘authorization protocol’ or ‘challenger protocol’ to be used for challenging according to the incoming request type.

trans-unit.source: Added two possible transforms to PAS:
trans-unit.target: Добавлены два возможных преобразования в ПАС:

trans-unit.source: All authenticateCredentials() returned a single None when they could not authenticate, although all calls expected a tuple.
trans-unit.target: Все функции authenticateCredentials()возвращали одно None,когда они не могли аутентифицироваться,хотя все вызовы ожидали кортеж.

trans-unit.source: Allow for a query string in CookieAuthHelper’s
trans-unit.target: Allow for a query string in CookieAuthHelper’s

trans-unit.source: Allow specifying a policy for transforming / normalizing login names for all plugins in a PAS:
trans-unit.target: Разрешить указать политику для преобразования/нормализации имен логинов для всех подключаемых модулей в PAS:

trans-unit.source: Avoid triggering “Emergency user cannot own” when adding a CookieAuthHelper plugin as that user.
trans-unit.target: Avoid triggering “Emergency user cannot own” when adding a CookieAuthHelper plugin as that user.

trans-unit.source: BasePlugin: The listInterfaces method only considered the old-style __implements__ machinery when determining interfaces provided by a plugin instance.
trans-unit.target: BasePlugin:Метод listInterfaces учитывал только машину старого образца __implements__при определении интерфейсов,предоставляемых экземпляром плагина.

trans-unit.source: Changed HTTPBasicAuthHelper to not rely on one obscure feature of the HTTPResponse.
trans-unit.target: Изменен HTTPBasicAuthHelper,чтобы не полагаться на одну непонятную особенность HTTPResponse.

trans-unit.source: Changed the methods of PAS to call
Clarified interface of IAuthenticationPlugin, which should return None rather than raising an exception if asked to authenticate an unknown principal; adjusted ZODBUserManager accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Уточненный интерфейс IAuthenticationPlugin,который должен возвращать None,вместо того,чтобы поднимать исключение при запросе аутентификации неизвестного принципала;соответствующим образом настроен ZODBUserManager.

trans-unit.source: Cleaned out a number of old imports, because we now require Zope >= 2.12.
trans-unit.target: Cleaned out a number of old imports, because we now require Zope >= 2.12.

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up code in CookieAuthHelper which allowed the form to override login/password if a cookie had already been set.
trans-unit.target: Очистка кода в CookieAuthHelper,которая позволяла переопределить логин/пароль,если файл cookie уже был установлен.

trans-unit.source: Convert from using zLOG to using the Python logging module. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/14)
trans-unit.target: Convert from using zLOG to using the Python logging module. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/14)

trans-unit.source: Converted to publishable security sensitive methods to only accept POST requests to prevent XSS attacks. See http://www.zope.org/Products/Zope/Hotfix-2007-03-20/announcement and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6310
trans-unit.target: Converted to publishable security sensitive methods to only accept POST requests to prevent XSS attacks. See http://www.zope.org/Products/Zope/Hotfix-2007-03-20/announcement and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6310

trans-unit.source: CookieAuth plugin didn’t successfully set cookies (first, because of a NameError, then, due to a glitch with long lines).
trans-unit.target: CookieAuth plugin didn’t successfully set cookies (first, because of a NameError, then, due to a glitch with long lines).

trans-unit.source: CookieAuth plugin now encodes and decodes cookies in the same format as CookieCrumbler to provide compatibility between sites running PAS and CC.
trans-unit.target: Плагин CookieAuth теперь кодирует и декодирует куки в том же формате,что и CookieCrumbler,чтобы обеспечить совместимость между сайтами,работающими под управлением PAS и CC.

trans-unit.source: CookieAuthHelper: If expireCookie was called and extractCredentials was hit in the same request, the CookieAuthHelper would throw an exception (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/43)
trans-unit.target: CookieAuthHelper: If expireCookie was called and extractCredentials was hit in the same request, the CookieAuthHelper would throw an exception (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/43)

trans-unit.source: Created a “Configured PAS” entry in the ZMI add list, which allows creating a PAS using base and extension GenericSetup profiles registered for IPluggableAuthService. This entry should eventually replace the “stock” PAS entry (assuming that we make GenericSetup a “hard” dependency).
trans-unit.target: Created a “Configured PAS” entry in the ZMI add list, which allows creating a PAS using base and extension GenericSetup profiles registered for IPluggableAuthService. This entry should eventually replace the “stock” PAS entry (assuming that we make GenericSetup a “hard” dependency).

trans-unit.source: Declared new ‘IPluggableAuthService’ interface, describing additional PAS-specific API.
trans-unit.target: Declared new ‘IPluggableAuthService’ interface, describing additional PAS-specific API.

trans-unit.source: Detect and prevent recursive redirecting in the CookieAuthHelper if the login_form cannot be reached by the Anonymous User.
trans-unit.target: Обнаружение и предотвращение рекурсивного перенаправления в CookieAuthHelper,если login_form не может быть доступен анонимному пользователю.

trans-unit.source: Do not fail when our base profiles are already registered. This may happen in tests if our
trans-unit.target: Не отказывайте,когда наши базовые профили уже зарегистрированы.Это может произойти в тестах,если наши

trans-unit.source: Do not override a previously set response body in
trans-unit.target: Не переопределяйте ранее установленное тело ответа в

trans-unit.source: DomainAuthHelper plugin: fix glitch for plugins which have never configured any “default” policy:
trans-unit.target: DomainAuthHelper plugin: fix glitch for plugins which have never configured any “default” policy:

trans-unit.source: Don’t assume that just because zope.interface can be imported that Five is present.
trans-unit.target: Don’t assume that just because zope.interface can be imported that Five is present.

trans-unit.source: Don’t fail on users defined in multiple user sources on the ZODBGroupManager listing page.
trans-unit.target: Don’t fail on users defined in multiple user sources on the ZODBGroupManager listing page.

trans-unit.source: Don’t log an error in zodb_user_plugin’s authenticateCredentials if we don’t have a record for a particular username, just return None.
trans-unit.target: Don’t log an error in zodb_user_plugin’s authenticateCredentials if we don’t have a record for a particular username, just return None.

trans-unit.source: Enabled the usage of the CookieAuthHelper login screen functionality without actually using the CookieAuthHelper to maintain the credentials store in its own auth cookie by ensuring that only active updateCredentials plugins are informed about a successful login so they can store the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Включило использование функции экрана входа CookieAuthHelper без использования CookieAuthHelper для поддержания хранилища учетных данных в собственном файле auth cookie,убедившись,что только активные плагины updateCredentials информируются об успешном входе в систему,чтобы они могли хранить учетные данные.

trans-unit.source: Exposed PAS’ ‘resetCredentials’ and ‘updateCredentials’ as public methods.
trans-unit.target: Exposed PAS’ ‘resetCredentials’ and ‘updateCredentials’ as public methods.

trans-unit.source: Extended the DomainAuthHelper to function as its own extraction plugin, to allow for the case that another extractor is registered, but does not return any credentials. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/46)
trans-unit.target: Extended the DomainAuthHelper to function as its own extraction plugin, to allow for the case that another extractor is registered, but does not return any credentials. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/46)

trans-unit.source: Fix CSRF defense incompatibility with some session implementations
trans-unit.target: Исправлена несовместимость защиты CSRF с некоторыми сеансовыми реализациями.

trans-unit.source: Fix ZMI Templates and add ZMI icons for Zope 4 (#36)
trans-unit.target: Fix ZMI Templates and add ZMI icons for Zope 4 (#36)

trans-unit.source: Fix broken ICredentialsUpdatedEvent event handler call to updateCredentials. (#59)
trans-unit.target: Fix broken ICredentialsUpdatedEvent event handler call to updateCredentials. (#59)

trans-unit.source: Fix manage_zmi_logout which stopped working correctly as soon as the PluggableAuthService product code was installed by correcting the monkeypatch for it in __init__.py. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/12)
trans-unit.target: Fix manage_zmi_logout which stopped working correctly as soon as the PluggableAuthService product code was installed by correcting the monkeypatch for it in __init__.py. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/12)

trans-unit.source: Fix usage of os.path.split(). Could result in Errors during import on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Исправлено использование функции os.path.split().Могло привести к ошибкам при импорте в Windows.

trans-unit.source: Fixed Dynamic Groups Plugin ZMI view (#33)
trans-unit.target: Fixed Dynamic Groups Plugin ZMI view (#33)

trans-unit.source: Fixed a couple more places where Zope 2-style
Fixed a set of tests that tested values computed from dictionaries and could break since dictionaries are not guaranteed to have any sort order.
trans-unit.target: Исправлен набор тестов,который проверял значения,вычисленные из словарей,и мог ломаться,так как в словарях не гарантировался никакой порядок сортировки.

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in DelegatingMultiPlugin which attempted to validate the supplied password directly against the user password - updated to use AuthEncoding.pw_validate to handle encoding issues
trans-unit.target: Исправлена ошибка в DelegatingMultiPlugin,которая пыталась проверять предоставленный пароль непосредственно на пароль пользователя-обновлен для использования AuthEncoding.pw_validate для решения проблем с кодировкой

trans-unit.source: Fixed deprecation warning occurring when used together with Five. (
trans-unit.target: Исправлено предупреждение о депрессии,возникающее при использовании вместе с Пятью.(

trans-unit.source: Fixed deprecation warnings for use of
trans-unit.target: Исправлены предупреждения о депрессии при использовании

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue in the user search filter where unrecognized keyword arguments were ignored resulting in duplicate search entries. (http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6300)
trans-unit.target: Fixed issue in the user search filter where unrecognized keyword arguments were ignored resulting in duplicate search entries. (http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6300)

trans-unit.source: Fixed serious security hole in DelegatingMultiPlugin which allowed Authentication if the EmergencyUser login was passed in. Added password validation utilizing AuthEncoding.pw_validate
trans-unit.target: Исправлена серьезная дыра в безопасности в DelegatingMultiPlugin,которая позволяла выполнять аутентификацию,если вход в систему EmergencyUser был передан.Добавлена проверка пароля с помощью AuthEncoding.pw_validate

trans-unit.source: Fixed test breakage induced by use of Z3 pagetemplates in Zope 2.10+.
trans-unit.target: Фиксированная пробная поломка,вызванная использованием табличек Z3 в Zope 2.10+.

trans-unit.source: Fixed test setup for tests using page templates relying on the
trans-unit.target: Исправлена настройка тестов для тестов с использованием шаблонов страниц,опирающихся на

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests so they run with Zope 2.11.
trans-unit.target: Исправлены тесты,поэтому они работают с Zope 2.11.

trans-unit.source: Fixed xml templates directory path computation to allow reuse of
trans-unit.target: Исправлено вычисление пути к каталогу xml шаблонов для повторного использования

trans-unit.source: Fixing up inconsistent searching in the listAvailablePrincipals method of the ZODBRoleManager and ZODBGroupManager plugins. Now both constrain searches by ID. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/11)
trans-unit.target: Fixing up inconsistent searching in the listAvailablePrincipals method of the ZODBRoleManager and ZODBGroupManager plugins. Now both constrain searches by ID. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/11)

trans-unit.source: Group and user plugins can now specify their own title for a principal entry (PAS will not compute one if they do).
trans-unit.target: Групповые и пользовательские плагины теперь могут указывать свое собственное название для основной записи (PAS не вычислит ее,если вычислит).

trans-unit.source: If an IAuthenticationPlugin returns None instead of a tuple from authenticateCredentials, don’t log a tuple-unpack error in PAS itself.
trans-unit.target: If an IAuthenticationPlugin returns None instead of a tuple from authenticateCredentials, don’t log a tuple-unpack error in PAS itself.

trans-unit.source: Implemented support for issuing challenges via IChallengePlugins.
trans-unit.target: Реализована поддержка в решении проблем через IChallengePlugins.

trans-unit.source: In authenticateCredentials do NOT fall back to using the login as userid when there is no match, as that gives a high chance of seeming to log in successfully, but in reality failing. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: В authenticateCredentials НЕ возвращайтесь к использованию логина в качестве userid,когда нет совпадений,так как это дает большие шансы на то,что вход будет успешным,но на самом деле неудачным.[мауриты]

trans-unit.source: In the ZODBRoleManager made it clearer that adding a removing a role does not have much effect if you do not do the same in the root of the site (at the bottom of the Security tab at manage_access). Fixes https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-pas/+bug/672694
trans-unit.target: In the ZODBRoleManager made it clearer that adding a removing a role does not have much effect if you do not do the same in the root of the site (at the bottom of the Security tab at manage_access). Fixes https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-pas/+bug/672694

trans-unit.source: Interfaces used by PAS are now usable in both Zope 2.7 and 2.8 (Five compatible)
trans-unit.target: Интерфейсы,используемые в PAS,теперь можно использовать как в Zope 2.7,так и в 2.8 (пять совместимых).

trans-unit.source: Launchpad #1079204: Added CSRF protection for the ZODBUserManager, ZODBGroupManager, ZODBRoleManger, and DynamicGroupsPlugin plugins.
trans-unit.target: Пусковая платформа #1079204:Добавлена защита от CSRF для плагинов ZODBUserManager,ZODBGroupManager,ZODBRoleManger и DynamicGroupsPlugin.

trans-unit.source: Launchpad #273680: Avoid expensive / incorrect dive into

Launchpad #649596: add a protocol for plugins which check whether a non-top-level PAS instance is “competent” to authenticate a given request; if not, the instance defers to higher-level instances. Thanks to Dieter Maurer for the patch.
trans-unit.target: Launchpad #649596: add a protocol for plugins which check whether a non-top-level PAS instance is “competent” to authenticate a given request; if not, the instance defers to higher-level instances. Thanks to Dieter Maurer for the patch.

trans-unit.source: Launchpad #789858: don’t allow conflicting login name in ‘updateUser’.
trans-unit.target: Launchpad #789858: don’t allow conflicting login name in ‘updateUser’.

trans-unit.source: Launchpad #795086: fixed creation of PropertiesUpdated event.
Made ‘Extensions’ a package, to allow importing its scripts as modules.
trans-unit.target: Made ‘Extensions’ a package, to allow importing its scripts as modules.

trans-unit.source: Made ZODBRoleManager plugin check grants to the principal’s groups, as well as those made to the principal directly.
trans-unit.target: Made ZODBRoleManager plugin check grants to the principal’s groups, as well as those made to the principal directly.

trans-unit.source: Made logging when swallowing exceptions much less noisy (they don’t necessarily require attention).
trans-unit.target: Made logging when swallowing exceptions much less noisy (they don’t necessarily require attention).

trans-unit.source: Made sure the Extensions.upgrade script does not commit full transactions but only sets (optimistic) savepoints. Removed bogus Zope 2.7 compatibility in the process. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/55)
trans-unit.target: Made sure the Extensions.upgrade script does not commit full transactions but only sets (optimistic) savepoints. Removed bogus Zope 2.7 compatibility in the process. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/55)

trans-unit.source: Made sure the emergency user via HTTP basic auth always wins, no matter how borken the plugin landscape.
trans-unit.target: Убедитесь,что экстренный пользователь через HTTP basic auth всегда выигрывает,независимо от того,как обременять ландшафт плагина.

trans-unit.source: Made the CookieAuthHelper only use the
Made the DomainAuthHelper return the remote address, even it the remote host is not available (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/49).
trans-unit.target: Made the DomainAuthHelper return the remote address, even it the remote host is not available (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/49).

trans-unit.source: Made unit tests pass when run with cAccessControl.
trans-unit.target: Сделанные единичные тесты проходят при работе с cAccessControl.

trans-unit.source: Make ‘getUserById’ pass the ‘login’ to ‘_findUser’, so that the returned user object can answer ‘getUserName’ sanely.
trans-unit.target: Make ‘getUserById’ pass the ‘login’ to ‘_findUser’, so that the returned user object can answer ‘getUserName’ sanely.

trans-unit.source: Make sure challenge doesn’t break if existing instances of the PluginRegistry don’t yet have
trans-unit.target: Make sure challenge doesn’t break if existing instances of the PluginRegistry don’t yet have

trans-unit.source: Modify CookieAuthHelper to prefer __ac form variables to the cookie when extracting credentials. (https://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5355)
trans-unit.target: Modify CookieAuthHelper to prefer __ac form variables to the cookie when extracting credentials. (https://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5355)

trans-unit.source: Modify ZODBGroupManager to update group title and description independently.
trans-unit.target: Модифицируйте ZODBGroupManager для самостоятельного обновления названия и описания группы.

trans-unit.source: Monkey-patch ZMI’s logout to invoke PAS’ ‘resetCredentials’, if present.
trans-unit.target: Monkey-patch ZMI’s logout to invoke PAS’ ‘resetCredentials’, if present.
Без изменений по сравнению с версией 1.3-beta

trans-unit.source: PAS and/or plugins can now take advantage of caching using the Zope ZCacheable framework with RAM Cache Managers. See doc/caching.stx for the details.
trans-unit.target: Теперь PAS и/или плагины могут воспользоваться преимуществами кэширования с помощью Zope ZCacheable framework с менеджерами кэша оперативной памяти.Подробности смотрите в документе doc/caching.stx.

trans-unit.source: PAS-level id mangling is no more. All (optional) mangling is now done on a per-plugin basis.
trans-unit.target: Идентификации на уровне PAS больше нет.Все (необязательные)изменения теперь выполняются по отдельности.

trans-unit.source: Passwords with “:” characters would break authentication (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/51)
trans-unit.target: Passwords with “:” characters would break authentication (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/51)

trans-unit.source: PluggableAuthService._verifyUser: changed to use exact_match to the enumerator, otherwise a user with login
trans-unit.target: PluggableAuthService._verifyUser:изменен,чтобы использовать точное_соответствие с перечислением,в противном случае пользователь с логином

trans-unit.source: Ported standard user folder tests from the AccessControl test suite.
trans-unit.target: Портированы стандартные тесты папок пользователей из набора тестов AccessControl.

trans-unit.source: Re-enabled XML-RPC support without requiring ZServer (#34)
trans-unit.target: Re-enabled XML-RPC support without requiring ZServer (#34)

trans-unit.source: Re-worded parts of the README so they don’t point to specific or non-existing files (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/6 and http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/47)
trans-unit.target: Re-worded parts of the README so they don’t point to specific or non-existing files (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/6 and http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/47)

trans-unit.source: Refactoring to make it easier to override
Removed STX links from README.txt which do nothing but return 404s when clicked from the README on zope.org. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/6)
trans-unit.target: Removed STX links from README.txt which do nothing but return 404s when clicked from the README on zope.org. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/6)

trans-unit.source: Removed some BBB code for Zope versions < 2.8, which is not needed since we require Zope > 2.8.5 nowadays.
trans-unit.target: Removed some BBB code for Zope versions < 2.8, which is not needed since we require Zope > 2.8.5 nowadays.

trans-unit.source: Repaired DeprecationWarnings due to use of Zope2 interface verification.
trans-unit.target: Восстановленное истощениеПредупреждения в связи с использованием верификации интерфейса Zope2.

trans-unit.source: Repaired a missing ‘nocall:’ in the Interfaces activation form.
trans-unit.target: Repaired a missing ‘nocall:’ in the Interfaces activation form.

trans-unit.source: Repaired arrow images in two-list ZMI views.
trans-unit.target: Восстановленные изображения стрелок в двух списках представлений ZMI.

trans-unit.source: Repaired the “simple” GenericSetup profile to be useful, rather than catastrophic, to apply: it now creates and registers a set of ZODB-based user / group / role plugins, along with a basic auth helper.
trans-unit.target: Repaired the “simple” GenericSetup profile to be useful, rather than catastrophic, to apply: it now creates and registers a set of ZODB-based user / group / role plugins, along with a basic auth helper.

trans-unit.source: Repaired unit test breakage (unittest.TestCase instances have ‘failUnless’/’failIf’, rather than ‘assertTrue’/’assertFalse’).
trans-unit.target: Repaired unit test breakage (unittest.TestCase instances have ‘failUnless’/’failIf’, rather than ‘assertTrue’/’assertFalse’).

trans-unit.source: Repaired warings appearing in Zope 2.8.5 due to a couple typos in security declarations.
trans-unit.target: Восстановленные предупреждения появляются в зоне 2.8.5 из-за пары опечаток в декларациях безопасности.

trans-unit.source: Require Zope 4.0b5 as minimum Zope version.
trans-unit.target: Требуется Zope 4.0b5 как минимальная версия Zope.

trans-unit.source: Return the created user in _doAddUser, to match change in AccessControl 2.13.4.
trans-unit.target: Верните созданного пользователя в _doAddUser,для соответствия изменениям в AccessControl 2.13.4.

trans-unit.source: Set a default value for the ‘login’ attribute of a PAS, to avoid UnboundLocalError.
trans-unit.target: Set a default value for the ‘login’ attribute of a PAS, to avoid UnboundLocalError.

trans-unit.source: Set appropriate cache headers on CookieAuthHelper login redirects to prevent caching by proxy servers.
trans-unit.target: Установите соответствующие заголовки кэша на CookieAuthHelper перенаправление входа для предотвращения кэширования прокси-серверами.

trans-unit.source: Simplified buildout to just what is needed to run tests.
trans-unit.target: Упрощенная сборка как раз для того,что нужно для проведения тестов.

trans-unit.source: Simplified detection of the product directory using ‘package_home’.
trans-unit.target: Simplified detection of the product directory using ‘package_home’.

trans-unit.source: Split up large permission tests into individual tests.
trans-unit.target: Разделите большие тесты на отдельные тесты.

trans-unit.source: The documentation is also online available at https://productspluggableauthservice.readthedocs.io/.
trans-unit.target: The documentation is also online available at https://productspluggableauthservice.readthedocs.io/.

trans-unit.source: The normal way it install this package is via
trans-unit.target: Обычным способом установки данного пакета является

trans-unit.source: The product can also be installed as a dependency of another distribution.
trans-unit.target: Продукт также может быть установлен в зависимости от другой дистрибуции.

trans-unit.source: The user id in extract user now calls _verifyUser to get the ID mangled by the enumeration plugin, instead of mangling it with the authentication ID, thereby allowing the authentication and enumeration plugins to be different plugins.
trans-unit.target: Идентификатор пользователя в извлечении теперь вызывает _verifyUser,чтобы получить ID,искаженный плагином перечисления,вместо того,чтобы искажать его идентификатором аутентификации,позволяя,таким образом,плагинам аутентификации и перечисления быть разными плагинами.

trans-unit.source: This product defines a fully-pluggable user folder, intended for use in all Zope sites.
trans-unit.target: Этот продукт определяет полностью подключаемую папку пользователя,предназначенную для использования на всех сайтах Zope.

trans-unit.source: Updated all code to raise new-style exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Обновлен весь код для поднятия исключений в новом стиле.

trans-unit.source: ZODBRoleManager and ZODBGroupManager needed the “two_lists” view, and associated images, which migrated to the PluginRegsitry product when they split; restored them.
trans-unit.target: ZODBRoleManager and ZODBGroupManager needed the “two_lists” view, and associated images, which migrated to the PluginRegsitry product when they split; restored them.

trans-unit.source: ZODBUserManager plugin: allow unicode arguments to
ZODBUserManager: Already encrypted passwords were encrypted again in addUser and updateUserPassword. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/Zope/1926)
trans-unit.target: ZODBUserManager: Already encrypted passwords were encrypted again in addUser and updateUserPassword. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/Zope/1926)

trans-unit.source: ZODBUserManager: Extend the “notional IZODBUserManager interface” with the left-out updateUser facility and a corresponding manage_updateUser method for ZMI use. Removed any responsibility for updating a user’s login from the updateUserPassword and manage_updateUserPassword methods. This fixes the breakage described in the collector issue below, and makes the ZMI view for updating users work in a sane way. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/42)
trans-unit.target: ZODBUserManager: Extend the “notional IZODBUserManager interface” with the left-out updateUser facility and a corresponding manage_updateUser method for ZMI use. Removed any responsibility for updating a user’s login from the updateUserPassword and manage_updateUserPassword methods. This fixes the breakage described in the collector issue below, and makes the ZMI view for updating users work in a sane way. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/PAS/42)

trans-unit.source: added project badges to the README, which will show on the GitHub front page
trans-unit.target: добавили бейджи проекта в README,который будет отображаться на главной странице GitHub

trans-unit.source: allowing to set the response body via an exception view in Zope >= 4.0b6.
trans-unit.target: allowing to set the response body via an exception view in Zope >= 4.0b6.

trans-unit.source: plugin of PlonePAS) but will not fail. When no plugin is able to update a user, this will raise an exception: we do not want to quietly let this pass when for example a login name is already taken by another user.
trans-unit.target: плагин PlonePAS),но не выйдет из строя.Когда ни один плагин не сможет обновить пользователя,это вызовет исключение:мы не хотим тихо пропускать это,когда,например,имя логина уже занято другим пользователем.

trans-unit.source: plugins. Thanks to Willi Langenburger for the patch. Fixes https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-pas/+bug/615474 .
trans-unit.target: plugins. Thanks to Willi Langenburger for the patch. Fixes https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-pas/+bug/615474 .

trans-unit.source: plugins/ZODBGroupManager.py: don’t freek out if a previously assigned principal goes away.
trans-unit.target: plugins/ZODBGroupManager.py: don’t freek out if a previously assigned principal goes away.

trans-unit.source: plugins/ZODBRoleManager.py: don’t claim authority for ‘Authenticated’ or ‘Anonymous’ roles, which are managed by PAS.
trans-unit.target: plugins/ZODBRoleManager.py: don’t claim authority for ‘Authenticated’ or ‘Anonymous’ roles, which are managed by PAS.

trans-unit.source: plugins/ZODBRoleManager.py: don’t freak out if a previously assigned principal goes away.
trans-unit.target: plugins/ZODBRoleManager.py: don’t freak out if a previously assigned principal goes away.

trans-unit.source: plugins/ZODBRoleManager: added logging in case searchPrincipial() returning more than one result (which might happen in case of having duplicate id within difference user sources)
trans-unit.target: плагины/ZODBRoleManager:добавлен логгинг в случае,если searchPrincipial()возвращает более одного результата (что может произойти в случае дублирования идентификатора в разных пользовательских источниках).

trans-unit.source: plugins/ZODBUserManager.py: plugin now uses AuthEncoding for its password encryption so that we can more easily support migrating existing UserFolders. Since PAS has been out for a while, though, we still will authenticate against old credentials
trans-unit.target: Плагин/ZODBUserManager.py:теперь использует AuthEncoding для шифрования пароля,так что мы можем легче поддерживать миграцию существующих папок UserFolders.Однако,так как PAS был отключен некоторое время,мы все еще будем аутентифицироваться по старым учетным записям
